overview:
David joined IRIS in September 2008 from The Sage Group plc.

David has over 25 yearsâ€™ experience in the software sector, originally from a technical background but progressing through support, sales and into senior marketing, general management and director level roles. His sector experience includes business application software across the SME and large enterprise sectors with Lotus Development (now part of IBM), Software Publishing Corporation, QSP and Sage.

David holds responsibility for the IRIS product strategies and roadmaps as well as driving best practice marketing activities across the group.
